website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality collagen facial cream from a popular Korean brand that produces visible results.
pros: A little goes a long way with this super-moisturizing cream
Helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles and can act as a makeup primer
cons: Best for dry skin as it is likely too heavy for oily or combination skin

customer_reviews.title: Winter weather defense for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my winter weather skin moisturizer. I’ve been using Etude House products for years, and they’re all excellent. But this is my favorite, my skin feels moist all day long, even when I’ve been out in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri L.

customer_reviews.title: Oilfull
customer_reviews.text: A huge fan of Etude House, but this is my least favorite product so far. I use the Moistfull Collagen Cream religiously and wanted to try a deeper moisturizer. My skin is oily in the Tzone, usually from being so dry and the Deep Cream makes it much oilier. It also does not absorb as well under my eyes and on my forehead and kind of just sits like a film. It looks very greasy all day long unless I use under a BB cream. Smells pretty neutral and the packaging is beautiful as always. I will probably go back to the regular Collagen Cream.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive combination skin. My t-zone is like an oil spill in the ocean. It is a disaster. This product makes the rest of my normal skin look like my t-zone. It is too greasy for a moisturizer and sleeping mask. The product doesn't absorb well and tends to leave a tiny film behind. This might work for someone who has VERY oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great night cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this night cream. My skin gets really dry at night and after I shower, and this cream is very thick and gets rid of the dryness. It looks a little greasy right when you put it on (but I usually use it right before I go to bed) but by morning my face is moisturized. Because the cream is so thick, the bottle lasts a long time. I probably still have a fifth of the bottle left after using it for around 4 months. If you have dry skin, this is a great cream! If you have regular or oily skin, you probably don't need something this moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Zachrich

customer_reviews.title: Try on this collagen moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I got this moisturizer two days before! The first night I tried it on!! oMG my skin felt moisturized, refreshed and smooth! I live in Colorado where my skin gets very dry! I’m glad I found this lotion because I had struggled to find a gentle, lighter oil free moisturizer for my face! It smells so good! The texture is a bit sticky but my skin absorbed it in few seconds! I will post some pictures after a couples weeks comparing pictures from the first week to the Second to let you all know the improvement on my face! After that I will say if this a product I will recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LauraS

customer_reviews.title: Fake product, immediate broke out
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a fake product. I've bought Etude in Japan before and everything from the packaging to the smell and texture is wrong. This made my skin breakout in ways it never has before causing scarring and other issues. The second I stopped using it my face started clearing up. I thought maybe it was because of other life factors and tried using it again, immediately broke out again in places I have never had acne before. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS VENDOR. Etude makes great products, but I believe this one to be a fake.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: my fave!
customer_reviews.text: I love this creme so much!!! If I'm lazy I'll just put this on and my skin still looks great in the morning, plump skin, less wrinkles. I am on my third jar. Usually, cremes do not make it past round one with me. Also, you can't beat the price! The jar lasts me about three months and I use it two to three times a day. My aesthetician was freaking out about my skin and asking me for my skin care regimen after I started using this. It's a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: hkudra

customer_reviews.title: Super moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This cream feels wet but thick. Its not like a gel but its not like a super thick moisturizer. I like how it makes my skin feel smooth, supple, kinda dewy. Doesn't make me oily or breakout. Love it But this is a moisturizer not a hydrating cream. So if your oily but feel like dehydrated then I would suggest to get the lighter vertion of this
customer_reviews.author: steven morales

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best moisturizer I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every moisturizer out there. Some almost work perfectly (Clinique's Moisture On Line, Neutrogena Hydroboost) but nothing has ever come close to this one. I do get an occasional whitehead if I use this too many days in a row but overall, it gets into my skin better than anything I've ever tried, including spa treatments and masks. I've gone through very little of the jar so far so it's an excellent bargain as well. I'll be buying this for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It’s good but is it really good?
customer_reviews.text: Soooo I got thIs newer version of etude’s collagen cream and it’s different. It did not sink into my skin as well as the older version. UNTIL. I went back to this product and read old reviews where someone mentioned you have to pat this cream into your skin. Not a gentle pat, but a good enough patting that you hear it. After I patted the cream into my skin, my skin absorbed it! However, I still would prefer the older model. I usually use this cream as a night cream. I remember the older version would do a better job of rejuvenating my skin when I looked at it in the mornings “also with less of the patting”
customer_reviews.author: College student

customer_reviews.title: Best face cream line I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: As a 64 yo woman I can truly say the Etude House products have changed my face in ways I never thought possible. Softness is back, dewy look is beautiful under makeup. I’ve bought the entire line and am seeing improvements daily. Don’t half step ladies. I also use Kirkland cleansing cloths at night and apply the nighttime products. I almost want to buy several months worth of products so I don’t ever have to switch to a different line of products and go thru the trial and error of finding what’s perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnmarie E Finn

customer_reviews.title: Love it, rich and creamy
customer_reviews.text: This product is thick and rich so it goes a long way. It makes my skin feel so soft, I use it on my face, neck, chest and hands. It is very good for the price, I have paid much more and not been happy at all. I will continue to use. My skin is showing improvement but nothing happens overnight. I have been using about 3 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: TameraG

customer_reviews.title: A bit greasy for first use
customer_reviews.text: Used it for The first time about an hour ago. You only need a teeny tiny bit. You have to massage it in and then do the "tapping" trick. It did feel a bit greasy on my face and took about 1/2 hour to absorb in. Will update after more uses. Yes, the box came sealed both top and bottom, with plastic barrier cover between jar and outer cover.
customer_reviews.author: Charmed One

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to people with really dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a really strong moisturizer for my extra dry skin. And found exactly what I needed. I use this cream for night time. Yes it absorbs a little slower and you need a longer face massage. But you wake up in the morning with moist, soft and smooth skin and feel happy and ready for upcoming day
customer_reviews.author: Galina

customer_reviews.title: Scent is a bit strong for me
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. I've used some of their other products before and bought the deep cream because I found the regular moisturizer a bit light. The texture of this cream is more what I was expecting, but the scent is a bit overwhelming for me. The moisturizing effect definitely lasts quite a while. I think it's a good product, but maybe not for those who are sensitive to scents.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Had good skin before this product
customer_reviews.text: The 'deep cream' formula dried up my skin and made it worse. I was fine before but had some dryness and wanted to use this to give my skin more of a bounce. If you have sensitive skin or combination skin I do not reccomend this formula. I used the regular moistful collagen cream before trying this and that worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jay&Be

customer_reviews.title: Make my mom's skin even drier
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom because she has dry skin from allergies and I used the other version of this and recommended this one to her since it has deeper moisture. She said that it didn't go well with her skin and it made her skin even more dry and peeling. I think it may have to do with the fragrance in the product and she might be sensitive to it. This product has quite a bit of fragrance. It comes with a scooper though which is great. Wish it could've worked out better for her.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lavender

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I tried it because the cream was renewed, but the old version is better
customer_reviews.author: hyewon shin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: My favorite so far. I try a lot of moisturizers since my older skin tends to be dry. This product is really nice. I've ordered it a few times. Nothing seems to beat it, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly D

customer_reviews.title: Very rich moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Product seems nice so far. I haven’t noticed any changes yet but too soon to tell. Very moisturizing and I’m enjoying the product. My concern is the packaging. Outside box was fine but upon opening the inside seal of the product was broken. That concerns me but still using because the outside box was sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Campion

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product, moisturizers tends to break me out with this one works without freaking me out. I have bought this several times already and I finally decided to leave a review. It’s really inexpensive and will last you to at least a month. I like that it’s not too sticky and leave your skin feeling moisturized. I highly recommend trying it at least once.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Morvant

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin that needs extra moisture
customer_reviews.text: I know some people say this is too rich, but since I live in dry California, and have dry sensitive skin, it is perfect for me as a night cream, even in summer. It feels so luxurious and moisturizing, but since I'm more prone to get blocked pores on my t-zone, I only use it on my cheeks, chin, neck, or wherever that needs extra attention, and use their Wonder Pore product on my t-zone. Love it, and love the reasonable price too. If you find my review helpful, I appreciate it if you would click the HELPFUL or YES button below. Thanks and happy shopping! :)
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper :)

customer_reviews.title: Good night cream
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me almost a full year before I ran out. A little goes a long way and it is so moisturizing on my skin. I have used it as a night cream. My skin didn't react to this product (I have sensitive skin that breaks out easily). It has helped my skin stay clear, smooth, and fresh. I can be pretty picky about scent, but this has a nice, subtle floral smell.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Oh no. Not this one
customer_reviews.text: It's a no no for me. I've been trying different Korean skin care products. My face does good with most of them. But this one makes my face break out. It also has this greasy texture that I really don't like. So now I just use it occasionally on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rui

customer_reviews.title: Love this product~
customer_reviews.text: I was super on the fence with buying this product due to the amount of negative comments and reviews but I can honestly say that this product is amazing! It is super moisturizing and a little goes a VERY long way. It does take a little while to fully warm up and blend into your skin but it's definitely worth it! I've been waking up with extra plump looking skin and my skin hasn't felt this soft in YEARS. Trust me, pat the product into your skin and use a VERY little amount and you'll be golden.
customer_reviews.author: Wenyi Lau

customer_reviews.title: Old version is better
customer_reviews.text: I like the new scent, but the moisturizing effect has decreased a significant amount. I keep having dry patches around my face even after applying the cream. I am going back to the old one
customer_reviews.author: Yunseon oh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: My go to moisturizer is no longer sold on Amazon and can only be purchased in South Korea so I decided to give this one a try. Very silky and has a lovely scent that isn’t overwhelming. Helps keep my skin smooth even during pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Light and absorbant
customer_reviews.text: I love Etude House products.....am NOT involved with the company in any way; just truly like them. The moisturizers are very light and absorb quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Doyle

customer_reviews.title: This is a great night cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a great night cream. My skin is quite dry and when I wake up in the morning so using this at night has really helped with keeping my skin hydrated while I sleep. It's a pretty big container so I know it's going to take me a while to make a dent in it.
customer_reviews.author: JCheng

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous improvement in skin tone & texture with first use.
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs instantly. Noticed improvement in moisture & brightness first use. It can only continue to improve skin tone & texture. Gentle pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY J ELLINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Thick.  Good for long flights
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get used to after using the non deep one, but Im into it now. Definitely takes a while to absorb, but it stays for about 2 full days. Good if traveling and you cant shower daily.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dreidel

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin in the winter
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer for me!! I get such dry skin in the winter and this had helped my skin to stay hydrated and full. I love it so much
customer_reviews.author: Allie M

customer_reviews.title: Need to get your dry facial skin back on track - give this a shot!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my skin. I can use it during the day as wel. It seems to have the right amount of oil to water balance where a lot of other creams seem to offer more watery consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Dkorator

customer_reviews.title: Good skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really smooth and nice cream. This cream has made my skin really nice and smooth I can also tell my small wrinkles are getting better and less noticeable😌
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: Simply Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This product is all I want in a moisturizer. It is light & smells like a flower shop. Just feels clean & fresh. I have ordered twice.
customer_reviews.author: nancy gagnier

customer_reviews.title: Too fragrant
customer_reviews.text: The perfume is strong, but smells good. I just wish it was fragrance free cuz it ended up breaking me out.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Feels so refreshing, leaving a cool finish.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years. It is very refreshing and my go to product after nightly cleansing.
customer_reviews.author: Gmextrdr

customer_reviews.title: Good for night
customer_reviews.text: I’m normal to dry skin, and I find it too oily for daily use. So I have been using it in night only.
customer_reviews.author: Clermond

customer_reviews.title: 100% LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great face cream especially in the winter when my skin is dry and not too happy. It absorbs in your skin and doesn't leave a greasy feel on your face (unless you use too much) but keeps my face and neck moisturized throughout the day. Best price I have found online!
customer_reviews.author: jjanczak

customer_reviews.title: The cream is very greasy and the skin doesn’t absorb the product
customer_reviews.text: The item Is very greasy and doesn’t work properly at least in my skin.I have good skin and I use to buy many product from Korea from amazon but this one I wouldn’t recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good basic cream
customer_reviews.text: I use this around the eyes, and as a nightly face cream. Not heavy, not thin. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is also a good product. Love the smell and effect on the skin. I just bought this for the 2nd time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use sparingly
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I only use it at night though, since it does make my face extremely shiny/oily-looking. I wake up with baby soft skin once I wash it off in the morning~
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Moisture of skin
customer_reviews.text: It is almost great but I still feel my skin tight. Like if I did not put anything on. All in all it is not too bad
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great face cream for colder months.
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing, a little heavier for colder months or summer if you have very dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: SBM

customer_reviews.title: Best face moisturizer ever
customer_reviews.text: I have fair, acne-prone, super dry, sensitive skin with rosacea (and I use a Retin-a) and I use this alone after I’ve washed my face on days I’m not going in the sun or overtop my Retin-a at night and I absolutely love it! It’s so moisturizing and makes my skin look dewy (not greasy). I’m on my second jar and will continue to repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Soft and great
customer_reviews.text: My face feels super soft in the morning and i feel fancy using it. A little goes a log way too. Will last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: Thick, heavy, oily
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy on skin and leaves oily residue feeling despite following instructions of use. Don't use if you're prone to breakouts, or prone to breakouts sue to this type of moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Use it sparingly, it can be a little to mosturizing if you use too much or have oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Smell and cream is really nice, it smells like peach cream. I hardly need to use any but for me since i have oily skin it can be too moisturizing. But collagen definitely helps skin
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth lee

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best moisturizers I have ever used and the price is exceptional. Non greasy but rich enough to nourish well and keep my skin plump and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Dried skin then this product ain’t for u
customer_reviews.text: Not as great. My skin is super dried and was trying this product to see if it was good but nope. Plus it irritated my cheek. It have a smell to it which I didn’t mind but since I have dried skin I would need to stay away from smelly fragrance of lotion . Overall, one star .. lotion don’t last long....
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Sleep in it!
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying this. I love it! Super thick feeling but I also asleep with it on and in the morning my skin feels amazing
customer_reviews.author: Hilary A

customer_reviews.title: Deep Moisture for Sure
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes your skin. I would recommend. There's another one that doensr say DEEP cream so beware. I accidentally bought that one after using this and I felt the difference. If you like very moisture on your face during winter time. This is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: It’s terrific!
customer_reviews.text: This will be my go to moisturizer. It’s affordable, but more important I love it! I’m glad I took a chance on it and no need to look further!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marciel

customer_reviews.title: My daily moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I truly love everything about the ETUDE brand. They are affordable but very high quality. This moisturizer gives ample hydration without a greasy residue.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: My skin is dry/combo so its hard to find a face cream that keeps its moisture. I try to use this as a night cream because of how thick it is, but I also love to use it under my make up with primer so my face doesn't get flaky.
customer_reviews.author: JaiLynne Cho

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs quickly
customer_reviews.text: Works best a night. I also wear it in winter as a regular moisturizer as I have dry sensitive skin. Non greasy and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this moisturizer for almost a year. I love how long it lasts me and how hydrated my face is after putting it on overnight. I still have a bit left but once I am out I will definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany A Tinsey

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! I would recommend this moisturizer for winter time
customer_reviews.author: Panhia Chang

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes with a pleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent! Moisturizes my face but does not make it oily. It makes my foundation looks more natural.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfABCD

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I'M 37 WITH NORMAL SKIN. I WEAR THIS AT NIGHT AND DURING THE DAY WHEN I FEEL MY SKIN NEEDS EXTRA MOISTURE(WINTER MONTHS). IT'S THE PERFECT MOISTURIZER AFTER MY RETINA A .
customer_reviews.author: corneliu mihalca

customer_reviews.title: Great moisture
customer_reviews.text: Light sent but works well. Definitely gives you the moisture needed. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: The Dutchess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product ! The second I put it on my skin felt hydrated and happy. Completely different quality level from the regular hydrating cream, within this price range
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. This cream is definitely moisturizing and I use it as a night cream with my retinoid. I haven’t had any issues with it absorbing into my ski or being too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: JazzYaszy

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: This product had a lot of fragrance and I found that I was allergic to it. It’s just an OK moisturizer. I would just get CerVea products.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bonzelaar

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging, Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Only con is my box came open, ripped, and kinda dirty. Also the seal was already removed on the inside of the moisturizer. However, I love the feel of it!
customer_reviews.author: valencia

customer_reviews.title: Its great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, its a thick cream that moisturizers and thicken your skin. See the difference in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Ai Woon

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this cream at night. I wake up with glowing, smooth skin! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: PYang

customer_reviews.title: Not the same cream
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cream for over five years. Now for some reason they have changed their formula. It burns my skin and smells very strongly like perfume. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: My opinion it’s great as is☺️
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the results of my face. Although I just recently used the product. I like how my skin looks and feel. Thanks 😊
customer_reviews.author: alice nicdao

customer_reviews.title: Best collagen moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Best collagen moisturizer. A little goes a long way for the price. I use toner works great together. I’m 55 and my skin looks great.
customer_reviews.author: 3xLaurax3

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Leaves the skin plump and moist. It is on the thicker side, so make sure to apply a think amount first and then add on from there, as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Not good..GOT HORRIBLE ACNE
customer_reviews.text: It totally broke out my skin..i never had a pimple on my skin..ever. But this product is worst purchase for my skin
customer_reviews.author: Shivani

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wife says: I love this, almost as nice as my La Niege brand moisturizer but much cheaper. A good amount of product and feels very rich. Moisturizes well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Goold

customer_reviews.title: Best Moisturizing Cream
customer_reviews.text: Use this for over a year. It has the same moisturizing effect as expensive cream. Really recommended. I use it morning and night time.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: does not absorb into skin
customer_reviews.text: does not absorb into the skin. you just walk around with an oily substance on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Kim

customer_reviews.title: Etude house collagen deep cream
customer_reviews.text: I do have dry skin during Wintertime, and this product is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Chung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer! It's really thick and great for over night.
customer_reviews.author: Livy

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying and I love it. My skin feels better and doesn’t dry out during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ice

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain for an excellent cream!
customer_reviews.text: After washing my face using Banila Clean It Zero, I use a spritz of Wonderpore followed by AHC eye cream and a schmear of Moistfull Deep Cream.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Spence

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturer use it under makeup or alone great smell .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It felt good going on the face
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me a long time! It felt good going on the face, and didn't feel sticky either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love their other products but this one didn’t live up to the expectations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love how moisturizing this cream is
customer_reviews.text: I love how moisturizing this cream is ! It is a little too rich for daily use but I feel like it will be perfect for a winter. I use it as a sleeping pack three times a week so it brings back moisture to my skin ! It's a perfect sleeping pack for me !! I really recommend it for everyone with dry skin !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: long search for a dry anti aging skin moisturizer is over
customer_reviews.text: best even beats high end moisturizer. Perfect for dry skin pain with Korean Sake essesnce!
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love love love it!! I am gonna repurchase this cream! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to re-order this. Makes my skin so soft
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can be good or bad depending on skin type
customer_reviews.text: A lot thicker than the regular cream. Can be good or bad depending on skin type, but definitely recommend for winter dry skin
customer_reviews.author: Denea Clark

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smell great and feels great on my overly dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kronika Peters

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dupe for Clarin's multi-active nuit cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a super rich, thick cream that I like to use as a night cream, occasionally in the day too. I was looking for a cheap alternative to my Clarin's multi-active nuit cream, and it is almost dead on in texture and effectiveness. The Etude house consistency is a little thicker, but once it smooths out on the skin it feels the same. I don't think this would be a cream for those with acne or really oily skin. It's good for those with dry patches, and more papery mature skin. I actually find it really smooths out my makeup when I use it as well.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: scent is overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I bought it before but didn't remember the scent being so overwhelming. It's not a horrible smell but it is SO STRONG and lasts for hours and hours. I can't even sleep at night from the smell just sitting around me like a perfume cloud. Moisturizing qualities are pretty good, but I would switch back to the regular cream which has a lighter citrusy smell.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Przybyla

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this cream! My skin is dehydrated, sensitive, and really dry. When I saw this product I didn't really think it'll help my skin, but boy was I wrong. This cream makes my skin extremely soft, hydrated, and healthy looking. Like I just said, my skin is sensitive and will react quickly to anything and everything, but this product gave me no reactions or issues especially with the light fragrance it has. I highly recommend trying this out, I bet you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Langwiser ☆

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: At 50, I've tried them all - cheap, expensive, drugstore - all the face creams. I now use this entire line. I love Moistfull Collagen and this is a perfect nightcream. It plumps your skin and is so moisturizing. This line is inexpensive and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: My moisturizer of choice
customer_reviews.text: About to order my second bottle. I have very dry skin and used Kiehls for years and am happy to say I found a more affordable option without compromising quality! It’s gel like which I thought wouldn’t work for my dry skin but it does the job nicely! I wish it came in a pump but handle it with care to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: I have pretty dry and chapped skin in the winter
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty dry and chapped skin in the winter, and it usually just sucks products up but this cream kind of sits on my face. It's a little greasy feeling and takes seemingly forever to absorb completely. Having said that, it's not giving me any adverse reactions and it feels kind of nice when it does dry all the way. I don't think I'd buy this one again unless my skin gets unbelievably dry, but it's definitely not the worst night cream I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Helms

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my rough, dry skin in a day
customer_reviews.text: I’m shocked by how well this works. I have very dry skin, and a big rough patch on one cheek. Nothing has worked, nothing, not even prescription creams. It’s been less than a day and my face is smooth. It absorbs slowly, but I like that and it isn’t noticeable. Never using another moisturizer after trying this. Highly recommend for dry skin!
customer_reviews.author: Angela G

customer_reviews.title: Deeply Hydrating Face Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely moisturizing and leaves my skin feeling so soft and hydrated. It's a large container and very reasonably priced. It also comes with a little scoop that you use to take the product out of the container, which is much more hygienic than dipping your fingers in. This would work best for those with dry skin. It would be too heavy for someone with normal to oily skin and might be a bit much in warm, humid weather. But I absolutely love it and have found my new HG face cream!! Note that there is a light scent, which I find pleasant, but others might not. There is also no SPF.
customer_reviews.author: Pauser

customer_reviews.title: Love the old HATE the NEW VERSION!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loveeeee this moisturizer!! It works very well for my sometimes dehydrated skin. HOWEVER.....the NEW VERSION is NOT the same as the old! The new has a very strong floral scent whereas the old is very light and fresh. Also, the NEW one doesn’t retain as much moisture as the old. Will not buy the new, hopping the old version is not discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff makes me happy. Long day
customer_reviews.text: Okay. This stuff makes me happy. Long day. Check. Tired out. Check. Face feels like it's gonna fall of- Gross, but Check. This stuff is like buddah. It feel so smooth, and my skin simply loves it. I've had no breakout or yucky issues. The scent on the other version is better, but this can't be beat moisture-wise. Great for oily skin (like mine) when it feels dry- Use sparingly
customer_reviews.author: Tristen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My go to when my skin is dried out
customer_reviews.text: I always reach for this cream when ever I feel like my skin needs more hydration underneath and this product is always consistent for me this cream is really dense so you don’t have to use too much. I would really recommend this for people who have dry skin But I would add a hydrating Emolsion for a extra boost
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

product_meta.title: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Deep Cream 2.5 fl.oz. 75ml (old version) - Long Lasting Strong Moist Facial Cream with Super Collagen Water, Makes Skin Healthy and Moisturized
feature_bullets: FORMULA with Macadamia seed oil and 605,773ppm of Super Collagen Water's small-sized particles helps skin become bouncy and dewy
LONG LASTING MOISTURE: Fully delivers moisture to keep your skin more hydrated and youthful for 100 hours
FINE PARTICLES OF SUPER COLLAGEN WATER: Contains 605,773ppm of Super Collagen Water dissociated by hydrolysis
INGREDIENT CALLOUTS: Free of Mineral oil, Polyacrylamide, Imidazolidinyl, urea, Triethanolamine, Tar color, Silicone oil and PEG surfactant
CLINICALLY TESTED: Skin irritation test done. Test carried out to evaluate 100 hour long lasting moisture effect
